AssignedCastDescription: Processors that can handle this kind of raw data-bandwidth are LosTech these days, Commander. I'm sorry, but this won't be cheap.

Description.Details: Allows you to Command an Additional Mechwarrior Directly Ok, I think we've identified a bottleneck in the system. We're gonna need a complete overhaul of our existing processors to deal with the latency issues we've been experiencing.
Description.Name: Command Console
